original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5650.
    Returns: the difference in pages read by Dustin and Sam in 40 minutes.
    """
    # L1
    dustin_pages_per_hour = 75 # Dustin can read 75 pages in an hour
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    dustin_pages_per_minute = dustin_pages_per_hour / minutes_per_hour

    # L2
    reading_time_minutes = 40 # in 40 minutes
    dustin_total_pages = reading_time_minutes * dustin_pages_per_minute

    # L3
    sam_pages_per_hour = 24 # Sam can read 24 pages in an hour
    sam_pages_per_minute = sam_pages_per_hour / minutes_per_hour

    # L4
    sam_total_pages = reading_time_minutes * sam_pages_per_minute

    # L5
    page_difference = dustin_total_pages - sam_total_pages

    # FA
    answer = page_difference
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Dustin reads {dustin_pages_per_minute} pages a minute because {dustin_pages_per_hour} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{dustin_pages_per_hour}/{minutes_per_hour}={dustin_pages_per_minute}>>{dustin_pages_per_minute}

Dustin reads {dustin_total_pages} pages in {reading_time_minutes} minutes because {reading_time_minutes} x {dustin_pages_per_minute} = <<{reading_time_minutes}*{dustin_pages_per_minute}={dustin_total_pages}>>{dustin_total_pages}
Sam reads {sam_pages_per_minute} pages a minute because {sam_pages_per_hour} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{sam_pages_per_hour}/{minutes_per_hour}={sam_pages_per_minute}>>{sam_pages_per_minute}

Sam reads {sam_total_pages} pages in {reading_time_minutes} minutes because {reading_time_minutes} x {sam_pages_per_minute} = <<{reading_time_minutes}*{sam_pages_per_minute}={sam_total_pages}>>{sam_total_pages}
Dustin reads {page_difference} more pages than Sam because {dustin_total_pages} - {sam_total_pages} = <<{dustin_total_pages}-{sam_total_pages}={page_difference}>>{page_difference}

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'reading_time_minutes' (40) was used instead of 'minutes_per_hour' (60).
